Title: Satin Trumpet Gown with Cutout Back

----

Featured-image: C238-red-satin-trumpet-gown-with-cutout-back_p.jpg

----

Description: A satin trumpet gown features a circular cutout in the back of the bodice. The front of the bodice is patterned with sequins and sparkling jewels that scallop at the waistline. A bateau neckline and sleeveless look add elegance to the gown.
